channel.title: Clan System
channel.description:
Can anyone help me work out how to add a clan system?
I mean like the owner of the clan would type ::makeclan (clan name) then he is the owner of the clan.
Anyone that wants to join would type ::joinclan (clan name)
Only thing i would need really is how to make it so that it makes a txt doc with all the clan names and the command can put and take clan names from there.
Also, I would like to have ::clanrankup (player name) and ::clanrankdown (playername)
If that would be possible at all then I would like help with it. Thanks.

item.title: Clan System
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn

@Final_Dawn wrote:

Can anyone help me work out how to add a clan system?

I mean like the owner of the clan would type ::makeclan (clan name) then he is the owner of the clan.
